title: Update Media Buy Response
description: Response payload for update_media_buy task. Returns either complete success data OR error information, never both. This enforces atomic operation semantics - updates are either fully applied or not applied at all.

oneOf.description: Success response - media buy updated successfully

media_buy_id.description: Publisher's identifier for the media buy

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for the media buy

implementation_date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when changes take effect (null if pending approval)

affected_packages.description: Array of packages that were modified with complete state information

oneOf.description: Error response - operation failed, no changes applied

errors.description: Array of errors explaining why the operation failed
